mapper.select: select bnum,btitle,bid,bnickname,bcdate,budate, bhit,bcontent,bgroup,bstep,bindent from board where bnum = #{bnum}
mapper.update: update board set bhit = bhit + 1 where bnum = #{bnum}
mapper.select: select t2.* from ( select row_number() over (order by bgroup desc, bstep asc) as num, t1.* from board t1 ) t2 where num between #{starRec} and #{endRec}
